titleStmt.title: Midd. ss. Ad general. quarterial. sessionem pacis Domini Regis tent. per adjornament pro com. Midd. apud Hicks-Hall in St. John-street in com. prædicto die Veneris, scilicet quarto decimo die Octobris anno regni Regis Caroli Secundi nunc Angliæ, &c. tricesimo tertio.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (Middlesex)

notesStmt.note: Orders of 14 Oct. 1681 by the Middlesex Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace concerning Public General Acts 17 Cha.II.c.2 and 22 Cha.II.c.1 against nonconformists and the holding of conventicles.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
